alert.note: Alert for Coastal Waldo; Knox (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 10 at 7:02AM EST until December 10 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility of a quarter-mile or less in dense fog. For the High Wind Warning, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Coastal Waldo and Knox Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the High Wind Warning, from 1 AM to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
